entity.name: The White House

text: @WhiteHouse Raise your hand if you demand plenty of hearings during this summer about Trump’s handling of coronavirus and how thousands of Americans died a horrible death under his watch. Benghazi-like hearings, please. ✋🏼 #KingTrump
